entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking utterly bewildered.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's relief is mentioned in the text.

entities.name: clankers
entities.description: Clankers are described as a collection of jangling metal.

entities.name: madam lestrange
entities.description: Madam Lestrange is mentioned as the person being addressed by the old goblin.

relationships.description: Harry feels relief because Hermione accepted the turn of events without comment.
Madam Lestrange is in possession of Clankers, as indicated by the old goblin's request to retrieve them.
